title: Replace Hero section image with uploaded WhatsApp PNG

requirements.summary: Add a sanitized static PNG asset for the new hero photo and update HeroSection to use it while preserving the existing imageError fallback.
acceptanceCriteria: A sanitized copy of the uploaded image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is loadable directly via `/assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>.png`.
`frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` references the new sanitized PNG path for the main hero image instead of `/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg`.
The hero image renders successfully in the Hero section without triggering the "Photo coming soon" fallback when the asset is present.
If the new hero image fails to load (e.g., missing file), the existing fallback UI still appears as before.

file_operations.description: Add a sanitized copy of the uploaded asset "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.png" as a static file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (no spaces/special characters in filename) so it can be served directly via `/assets/generated/whatsapp-image-2026-02-11-at-7-14-23-am.png`.

Replace the hero photo `src` currently set to `/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg` with `/assets/generated/whatsapp-image-2026-02-11-at-7-14-23-am.png`, ensuring the existing `imageError` state and onError-driven fallback UI remains unchanged.
